title: SC prisoners denied access to sunlight & cop who killed Eric Garner wants job back
text:
The officer who choked Eric Garner to death is suing to get his job back. A newly leaked video shows Fresno cops shooting an unarmed teen as he ran away. Incarcerated people in South Carolina are appealing to the UN after being denied access to sunlight for over a year. And a preview of this week’s episode of Redacted Tonight.
